article_title: Edmond Residents Pass Two Sales Tax Extensions - News9.com - Oklahoma City, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports
article_text:
Edmond residents passed two sales tax extensions Tuesday night.

Residents passed the half cent sales tax extension by 73 percent and passed the one cent sales tax extension by 80 percent.

The half cent sales tax extension will be used for capital improvements after 2017.

The one cent sales tax extension will be used for general purpose.

Click here to view more election results.
